resources.string: "Along with bug fixes, this update also includes new and enhanced features."
"Changes in this release can be found in the app information, under “New Features”."

string-array.name: new_release_body
string-array.item: "You can now also request digital certificates of recovery through the app and then add them in the app. You can use these certificates within the EU to prove recovery from a previous infection (for international travel, for example)."
"You can now add digital COVID certificates of family members in the app and manage them, to submit certificates when needed (for international travel, for example)."

"The following vaccination statistics are now available in the app:
	- Number of people who have received at least one vaccine dose
	- Number of people who are fully vaccinated
	- Number of administered vaccine doses"
